text:
The Problem:
I have installed Apache server 2.0.49 on a P4 2.4 machine running Windows XP 
Pro.
Apache is serving the pages broken: half pages, half images, no pages at all, 
no images at all.
I have now Apache 1.3.x installed and it works fine. But when I go back to 
2.0.49 the problem appears again.
The error log fills with messages of error 996: Overlapped I/O event is not in 
a signaled state: : core_output_filter: writing data to the network
creator: aninmitc@yahoo.com.ar
chip@force-elite.com
text: *** Bug 30012 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
